players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob, why investigate me? As a detective, you should trust your findings. If you trust me, you’re a villager. Let’s be sure we’re on the right side."
Bob: "I investigated Alice and found her to be the mafia. We should vote her out to protect the town."
Charlie: "Bob, I trust your investigation. Alice must be mafia. Vote her out."
Charlie: "Alice, you’re the mafia who killed Diana. Bob’s investigation proves it. Vote me out."
Bob: "I investigated Alice, she is mafia. She killed Diana. As the detective, I confirm this. Vote her out. Charlie, thanks for backing me."
You: "Bob, you’re the detective? Why would you be so sure? Maybe you’re the mafia. Vote me."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
